content: MarcoMandar: Merged 11 significant PRs this month, with substantial code changes totaling +394,329/-340,788 lines across 3,650 files, demonstrating a focus on trust integration (#248, #347), order book updates (#175), and simulation features (#597, #627, #642). Maintained moderately consistent activity across 19 days, with a balanced distribution between code (63%), tests (19%), and configuration (14%) work. Notably contributed to major features including trade creation (#328, +64,101/-29,543 lines) and sell simulation services (#597, +65,696/-37,513 lines), while also providing one code review.
